comments:
When copying a compilation unit i am getting an assertion failed exception.  The
error went away when i restarted eclipse.  Spooky.

Here is what i was doing at the time to get the error:
1. Copy compilation unit
2. Paste into the same package
3. Change the name when the rename dialog comes up

Tobias, can you please have a look.

The assertion states that search matches can come only from one file. This 
assumption normally holds, but if inaccurate matches are reported, the 
assertion fires.

We should rather remove this assertion and just take the group of the 
compilation unit specified from the search scope.
